about_the_game:
Welcome to the Backpacker Guild. To vanquish wicked monsters, hire diverse mercenaries and craft powerful items to pack their bags. Only by the hands of you, the guild master, can powerful mercenaries be created.

Features



  • Hire mercenaries and pack their bags freely.
Place items in the mercenaries bags. Depending on how you arrange the items, mercenaries may become stronger, weaker, or even behave strangely.



  • Explore the ManaMap to uncover various bonuses and item crafting recipes.
The ManaMap holds various bonuses and item crafting recipes.
Use mana stones to obtain recipes and bonuses.



  • Let's gather materials from monsters to craft powerful items.
Monsters are excellent resources with nothing to waste.
Obtain various materials from monsters to craft equipment.



  • Complete various quests from guild visitors
Guild visitors bring quests ranging from item crafting to monster hunting.
Diligently complete these quests to earn generous rewards and enhance your reputation.


  • Real-time automatic battles.
Once you've packed their bags, now trust your mercenaries and watch the battles unfold.
Your mercenaries will return to the guild with various spoils after emerging victorious from battles.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum screen resolution 1280x720
